query:
SELECT
                s.name AS spot_name,
                u.first_name AS "first_name!: String",
                u.last_name AS "last_name!: String",
                u.email,
                u.phone,
                r.contribution
               FROM rsvps r
               JOIN spots s ON s.id = r.spot_id
               JOIN rsvp_sessions rs ON rs.id = r.session_id
               JOIN users u ON u.id = r.user_id
               WHERE rs.id = ?
